tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection.Connection
      • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionListener

    public class ConnectionManager
extends Connection
implements ConnectionListener
    Creates and manages all connections
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael McKey

public static java.util.List<android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice> getBluetoothDevices()

        Returns:
        - a list of the currently available Bluetooth Classic devices

      • connect_async

        private void connect_async()
        Ends all previous connections and connects to the device that was chosen last. Is called by a thread to make connecting asynchronous.

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Ends all previous connections and connects to the device that was chosen last. Runs asynchronously.
        Specified by:
        connect in class Connection

      • connect

        public void connect(@NonNull
                    ConnectionMethod newConnectionMethod,
                    @NonNull
                    java.lang.String newExtraInfo)
        Connects to the chosen device
        Parameters:
        newConnectionMethod - the method which is used to connect to the device (e.g. WIFI, SERIAL, BLUETOOTH)
        newExtraInfo - the extra information necessary to create the connection (e.g. URL, BAUD RATE, MAC ADDRESS)

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to the connected device
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in class Connection
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send as text

                           java.lang.String reason)
        Propagates the onDisconnected() message to all listeners
        Specified by:
        onDisconnected in interface ConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason the device has been disconnected(null disconnected normally)

      • onReceivedMessages

        public void onReceivedMessages(@NonNull
                               java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> unreadMessages)
        Passes on new messages to all listeners
        Specified by:
        onReceivedMessages in interface ConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        unreadMessages - a list of the new messages that haven't been processed yet

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects all connections(and removes listeners). Can reconnect by calling the connect method
        Specified by:
        disconnect in class Connection
